title: Update task-executor agent with beads workflow
description:
Rewrite task-executor.md to follow proper beads workflow pattern.

Current issues:
- Scoped as 'non-implementation work' - should handle any assigned task
- Lists specific task types (unnecessary)
- Includes work log instructions (Control Tower responsibility)
- Missing beads workflow (read notes, update notes, handoff)

New structure:
1. Receive task ID (not description)
2. Read task: bd show <task-id>, notes field is 'read me first'
3. Work on task, update notes at milestones
4. Close with notes updated, brief close reason
5. Report to Control Tower: deliverables, vault docs created, follow-up work

Nudges:
- For research/planning/documentation tasks: invoke /creating-vault-documentation
- Reference beads skill for deeper workflow knowledge

Reference: Beads Skill Analysis.md in vault

title: Enhance creating-tasks skill with field usage and interactive completion requirements
description:
Update creating-tasks skill with:

1. Field usage reference (from beads skill ISSUE_CREATION.md):
   - description: WHY and WHAT (immutable problem statement)
   - design: HOW to build it (implementation approach, can evolve)
   - acceptance-criteria: WHAT success looks like (verifiable outcomes, stable)
   
2. Interactive completion requirement:
   When creating tasks interactively with Mark, task creation is NOT complete until all three fields are populated:
   - description ✓
   - design ✓  
   - acceptance-criteria ✓
   
3. Reference beads skill ISSUE_CREATION.md#design-vs-acceptance for the critical distinction between design (HOW) and acceptance criteria (WHAT).

Context: Mark identified that acceptance criteria field exists but isn't being used consistently. The design vs acceptance-criteria distinction prevents implementation details from masquerading as success criteria.
notes:
COMPLETED:
- Added Field Semantics section to creating-tasks skill (description/design/acceptance-criteria)
- Added Interactive Task Creation section requiring all three fields
- Created scripts/session-start.py for unified session state gathering
- Rewrote discovering-issues as complete side quest capture protocol (draft status, blocker assessment)
- Updated agent-working to point to discovering-issues skill
- Updated control-tower output style to use session-start.py

EXPANDED SCOPE:
Original task covered field usage in creating-tasks. Expanded to include:
- Draft status workflow for agent-discovered issues (bd config already set by Mark)
- Session start script consolidating 3 bd calls
- Side quest protocol restructuring (triggers in agent-working, protocol in discovering-issues)

KEY DECISIONS:
- Two-step capture: bd create then bd update --status draft (create lacks --status flag)
- Surfacing drafts is Control Tower responsibility, not agent skill content
- Triggers stay in agent-working; complete protocol in discovering-issues
close_reason: Completed with expanded scope: field semantics, draft status workflow, session-start script, side quest protocol restructure
